description:
This is my first torrent. :)


This is a 1995 movie by Michelangelo Antonioni - my favorite. Insecure the WinRAR archive you will find the original movie with no embedded subs and the Portuguese subtitle archive in .srt format - I translated it myself and although I've done it with love, it may not be free from mistakes.

Most free codec packs nowadays come with a player that can read the subtitles if the movie archive and the subtitle archive are:

1) In the same folder and
2) with the same name

If you don't have such a pack, STW for a program called VobSUB.


Hope you enjoy it.
